name: Tekken
description: A high-octane fighting game featuring a vast roster of characters with unique fighting styles.

name: Elden Ring
description: Embark on a quest in the Lands Between, guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring.

name: Deadpool
description: Jump into the chaotic world of Deadpool, where humor and action collide in explosive fashion.

name: Minecraft
description: A game that puts your creativity to the test, allowing you to build, explore, and survive in a blocky, procedurally generated 3D world.

name: Call of Duty
description: Experience the gritty realism and cinematic intensity of Call of Duty's iconic battles and campaigns.

name: FIFA
description: The world's most popular football game brings the thrill of the sport to your screen, featuring leagues, teams, and players from around the globe.

name: Star Wars
description: Explore the galaxy in Star Wars, engaging in epic battles and experiencing the saga of Jedi, Sith, and the force.

name: Jumanji
description: A supernatural game that offers a perilous adventure to those who dare to play, with jungle hazards and animal stampedes.

name: Evil West
description: Fight through hordes of supernatural enemies in the Wild West as a vampire hunter.
